name: Timbuktu Pro Connection Document
summary: Learn about .TMB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Connection documents are created as desktop shortcuts. They can be double-clicked to connect to a remote computer. They may also be right-clicked and opened to edit the connection properties.

description: Remote access control file used by Timbuktu, a program that allows multiple computer systems to be controlled remotely; stores the connection settings for a remote connection, including the computer name, remote IP address, and security settings.
